article_title: Iran: Air strike on Syria will not go 'unanswered'
sentence: The  Middle  East  has  been  on  heightened  alert  since  7  October,  when  Hamas  launched  an  attack  on  southern  Israel,  killing  about  1,200  people,  mainly  civilians,  and  taking  240  hostages  back  to  Gaza.

article_title: Iran: Air strike on Syria will not go 'unanswered'
sentence: Iran's  sudden  strikes  show  just  how  perilous  region  has  become  More  than  24,900  people  have  been  killed  in  Gaza  since  Israel  launched  its  military  response,  according  to  the  Hamas-run  health  ministry.

article_title: Iran: Air strike on Syria will not go 'unanswered'
sentence: Correction  13th  February:  This  article  wrongly  reported  that  about  1,300  people  had  been  killed  following  the  7th  October  attack  by  Hamas.

article_title: Iran: Air strike on Syria will not go 'unanswered'
sentence: This  was  based  on  counting  those  who  later  died  from  their  injuries  in  addition  to  the  figure  of  more  than  1,200.
